abstract: Daio Paper will file criminal complaint against its former chairman Mototaka Ikawa, accusing him of illicitly borrowing $140 million in company money and channeling some of it to Las Vegas casino firm Las Vegas Sands; revelations, coming on heels of Olympus scandal, raise new questions about corporate governance.
snippet: Coming on the heels of charges of improper payments made by Olympus, revelations at Daio Paper raised new questions about corporate governance.
lead_paragraph: Coming on the heels of charges of improper payments made by Olympus, revelations at Daio Paper raised new questions about corporate governance.

headline.main: Another Scandal Unsettles Corporate Japan as Paper Maker Accuses Ex-Chairman
headline.print_headline: Another Scandal Unsettles Corporate Japan as Paper Maker Accuses Ex-Chairman
